title: MY ACCOUNT WAS HACKED PLEASE HELP ME RIOT
body: MY USERNAME WAS xDyz / I was sent a link saying it would give me free skt skins but i was stupid enough to click on the link i was hacked not long after this post had been sent please help me riot it would mean alot i put so much money an effort in to this account.

replies.body:
Submit an account recovery ticket to support ASAP.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
